pr_title: fix #2136 Turn discard/errorMode javadoc tags into plain paragraphs

timeline.bodyText: the feature is exposed to users as doOnDiscard rather than onDiscard so maybe this should be used in the <strong> header everywhere? This was a shortcoming of the original tag description that we can fix here.
timeline.author: simonbasle
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -202,7 +202,7 @@ public Context currentContext() { * Create a {@link FluxProcessor} that safely gates multi-threaded producer * {@link Subscriber#onNext(Object)}. * - * @reactor.discard The resulting processor discards elements received from the source + *

onDiscard Support: The resulting processor discards elements received from the source

replies.bodyText: Rebased and updated to Discard Support which is more in line with the Error More Support "sentence".
replies.author: ericbottard

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/reactor-core/src/main/java/reactor/core/publisher/FluxProcessor.java b/reactor-core/src/main/java/reactor/core/publisher/FluxProcessor.java index 1ee5e366b..4e3b3b46d 100644 --- a/reactor-core/src/main/java/reactor/core/publisher/FluxProcessor.java +++ b/reactor-core/src/main/java/reactor/core/publisher/FluxProcessor.java @@ -202,7 +202,7 @@ public abstract class FluxProcessor extends Flux * Create a {@link FluxProcessor} that safely gates multi-threaded producer * {@link Subscriber#onNext(Object)}. * - *

onDiscard Support: The resulting processor discards elements received from the source + *

Discard Support: The resulting processor discards elements received from the source * {@link Publisher} (if any) when it cancels subscription to said source. * * @return a serializing {@link FluxProcessor}
